metadata.name: Teddy Ninja #1
metadata.description:
Collect Teddy Ninja #1 and #2 to claim a secret character for free!  
The Teddy Ninjas belong to the classic series of characters originally named "dust the teddy's - Angst vor dem Sterben?" This series was intended to show how badly animals are treated by mankind. The teddy ninjas are a unique and exciting NFT collection created by David Stegmann featuring a group of cute and powerful illustrated characters trained in the art of ninjutsu (or maybe they die trying). This collection consists of one-of-a-kind digital collectibles, each with a distinctive appearance and personality.  
Each Teddy Ninja has been meticulously painted with incredible attention to detail, with a variety of outfits and facial expressions that give each teddy its own unique charm and appeal.  There's a Teddy Ninja for every collector to love. But at the end they just try to take care of each other and live together in complete peace and harmony.  
The Teddy Ninja is among the iconic characters that Stegmann, also known as dust, mostly painted in public spaces during his early years as a street artist.
